Html: In my SCSF/CAB app, I dynamically add items (one per module) to a TreeView Workspace.  The behavior is similiar to the DefiningModulesInCode quickstart.  I have a TreeViewUIAdapter defined in my project to handle the adds to the tree.  What is the analog to this in Prism?  Is there an example of this somewhere?  Thanks.
I'm going to RTFM myself.  I see I need to develop a custom IRegionAdapter.  However, a working example would be a ++.
